detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract EURO (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EURO__1.sol#104-225) has payable functions:
	 - EURO.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EURO__1.sol#214-216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
